mapper.insert: insert into banner_img (b_id, b_name, b_url, b_site, b_status, b_belong, b_addtime) values (#{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE b_name = #{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_url = #{bUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_site = #{bSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_status = #{bStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_belong = #{bBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_addtime = #{bAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.update: update banner_img set b_name = #{bName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_url = #{bUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_site = #{bSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_status = #{bStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_belong = #{bBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b_addtime = #{bAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where b_id = #{bId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
